summary: A test suite that validates the ModelParallelStrategy in Lightning Fabric, covering unsupported checkpoint operations, device mesh handling, module compatibility, checkpoint loading and saving edge cases, meta-device materialization, backward synchronization control, parallel function execution, timeout handling, and version-specific behavior.
business_intent: To guarantee the robustness and correctness of model parallel training features in Lightning Fabric, preventing regressions and ensuring users can rely on proper error handling, checkpoint management, and device mesh validation.
